description: Adds the tax exemption for a single account or all accounts listed in a consolidated billing family. The IAM action is tax:UpdateExemptions.

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: The list of unique account identifiers. (string) ---

parameters.name: authority
parameters.description: The address domain associate with the tax information. The country code for the country that the address is in. state (string) --- The state that the address is located.

nested_params.name: country
nested_params.description: The country code for the country that the address is in.

nested_params.name: state
nested_params.description: The state that the address is located.

parameters.name: exemptionCertificate
parameters.description: The exemption certificate. The exemption certificate file content. The exemption certificate file name.

parameters.name: exemptionType
parameters.description: The exemption type. Use the supported tax exemption type description.
